caption.p: Comparative response features of JA tubers treated with essential oils after infection with P. polonicum under storage at 25 ± 2 °C (mean ± SD). C: untreated control; P: untreated infection by P. polonicum (ARS20); CR: treated with caraway oil; CL: treated with clove oil; CRP: treated with caraway oil plus infection by P. polonicum; CLP: treated with clove oil plus infection by P. polonicum; ND: not determined due to full deterioration.
